frame.name: Residence
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame has to do with people (the <fen>Resident</fen>s) residing in <fen>Location</fen>s, sometimes with a <fen>Co-resident</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Resident">Peter</fex> <t>lives</t> <fex name="Location">in New York</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Resident">Sue</fex> <m>is</m> an <t>inhabitant</t> <fex name="Location">of Los Angeles</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Resident
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual(s) that reside at the <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Res">Hannah</fex> <t>lives</t> in San Francisco.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition:
<def-root>The place in which somebody resides.
<ex><fex name="Res">Sue</fex> <t>lives</t> <fex name="Location">in Berkeley</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Co_resident
FE.definition:
<def-root>A person or group of people that the resident is staying with or among.
<ex><fex name="Res">Boris</fex> still <t>lives</t> <fex name="Co_resident">with his parents</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of a <fen>Resident</fen> during their residence.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An act of the <fen>Resident</fen> that enables them to reside in the <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex>He <t>dwelt</t> in the wild for years <fex name="Means">by foraging nuts and berries and occasionally stealing</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE refers to the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Resident</fen> resides.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Circumstances</fen> describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>
